languages.text: "Верно. Отдельно отмечу особое отношение губернатора к нашей сопровождающей — возможно, ему нужно ее безоговорочное доверие... Чтобы она что-то сделала или наоборот, в нужный момент не вмешивалась".
languages.translation_comment: Без FW_Moralite_dialogue этот диалог не откроется (т.к. одна из следующих улик будут привязана к моралите), поэтому здесь я спокойно использовала контекст моралите.

traits.locale_text: {n}Судья коротко кивает.{/n} "Во время приступа она схватилась за грудь, где висит сапфирион. И он мерцал... Просто украшение? Не думаю. Хотя Империум и использует его в качестве аналога ударопрочного стекла — здесь кристалл явно реагировал на происходящее. Полагаю, мы владеем не всей информацией о его свойствах".

languages.translation_comment: Без FW_Moralite_dialogue этот диалог не откроется (т.к. одна из следующих улик будут привязана к моралите), поэтому здесь я спокойно использовала контекст моралите.

languages.text: "You are not wrong. In particular, I would like to note the governor granting preferential treatment to our attendant. Perhaps he needs her unconditional trust... to ensure that she does something or, on the contrary, remains uninvolved at just the right moment."
languages.original_text: "Верно. Отдельно отмечу особое отношение губернатора к нашей сопровождающей — возможно, ему нужно ее безоговорочное доверие... Чтобы она что-то сделала или наоборот, в нужный момент не вмешивалась".

traits.locale_text: "You are not wrong. I would also like to note the governor's particular attitude to our attendant. Perhaps he needs her unconditional trust... So that she does something or, on the contrary, remains uninvolved at the right moment."
{n}The Proctor nods briefly.{/n} "Circumstantial, but may be of significance if combined with other observations. Anything else?"

"You are not wrong. I would also like to note the governor's particular attitude toward our attendant. Perhaps he needs her unconditional trust... to ensure that she does something or, on the contrary, remains uninvolved at just the right moment."

"You are not wrong. I would also like to note the governor's particular attitude toward our attendant. Perhaps he needs her unconditional trust... to ensure that she does something or, on the contrary, remains uninvolved at just the right moment."

"You are not wrong. In particular, I would like to note the governor granting preferential treatment to our attendant. Perhaps he needs her unconditional trust... to ensure that she does something or, on the contrary, remains uninvolved at just the right moment."

"You are not wrong. In particular, I would like to note the governor granting preferential treatment to our attendant. Perhaps he needs her unconditional trust... to ensure that she does something or, on the contrary, remains uninvolved at just the right moment."

languages.text: "Ihr habt nicht unrecht. Ich möchte vor allem anmerken, dass der Gouverneur unsere Dienerin bevorzugt behandelt hat. Vielleicht braucht er ihr bedingungsloses Vertrauen ... damit sie etwas Bestimmtes tut oder vielmehr im richtigen Augenblick etwas unterlässt."
languages.original_text: "You are not wrong. In particular, I would like to note the governor granting preferential treatment to our attendant. Perhaps he needs her unconditional trust... to ensure that she does something or, on the contrary, remains uninvolved at just the right moment."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt nicht unrecht. Ich möchte vor allem anmerken, dass der Gouverneur unsere Dienerin bevorzugt behandelt hat. Vielleicht braucht er ihr bedingungsloses Vertrauen ... damit sie etwas Bestimmtes tut oder vielmehr im richtigen Augenblick etwas unterlässt."

languages.text: « Vous n'avez pas tort. Je tiens notamment à signaler que le gouverneur a accordé un traitement de faveur à notre suivante. Il a peut-être besoin de sa confiance totale... afin de s'assurer qu'elle fasse bien quelque chose, ou au contraire, qu'elle ferme les yeux au bon moment. »
languages.original_text: "You are not wrong. In particular, I would like to note the governor granting preferential treatment to our attendant. Perhaps he needs her unconditional trust... to ensure that she does something or, on the contrary, remains uninvolved at just the right moment."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'avez pas tort. Je tiens notamment à signaler que le gouverneur a accordé un traitement de faveur à notre suivante. Il a peut-être besoin de sa confiance totale... afin de s'assurer qu'elle fasse bien quelque chose, ou au contraire, qu'elle ferme les yeux au bon moment. »

languages.text: 「あなたの言うことは間違っていません。特に、総督が私たちの従者に優遇措置を与えている点に注目したいと思います。おそらく彼は彼女の無条件の信頼を必要としているのでしょう…彼女に何らかの行動をさせるため、あるいは逆に、ちょうど良いタイミングで関与しないようにするために」
languages.original_text: "You are not wrong. In particular, I would like to note the governor granting preferential treatment to our attendant. Perhaps he needs her unconditional trust... to ensure that she does something or, on the contrary, remains uninvolved at just the right moment."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの言うことは間違っていません。特に、総督が私たちの従者に優遇措置を与えている点に注目したいと思います。おそらく彼は彼女の無条件の信頼を必要としているのでしょう…彼女に何らかの行動をさせるため、あるいは逆に、ちょうど良いタイミングで関与しないようにするために」

languages.text: «No se equivoca. Concretamente me gustaría señalar que el gobernador ha concedido un trato preferente a nuestra asistente. Quizá requiera su confianza incondicional... para asegurarse de que haga algo o, antes al contrario, que no se involucre llegado el momento apropiado».
languages.original_text: "You are not wrong. In particular, I would like to note the governor granting preferential treatment to our attendant. Perhaps he needs her unconditional trust... to ensure that she does something or, on the contrary, remains uninvolved at just the right moment."

traits.locale_text: «No se equivoca. Concretamente me gustaría señalar que el gobernador ha concedido un trato preferente a nuestra asistente. Quizá requiera su confianza incondicional... para asegurarse de que haga algo o, antes al contrario, que no se involucre llegado el momento apropiado».

languages.text: “一点都没错。我想特别指出这一点：那位总督相当照顾我们这位随行侍女。或许他想得到她无条件的信任……以便让她在某个特定的时刻做些什么，又或许恰恰相反，他希望她能在某个特定时刻置身事外。”
languages.original_text: "You are not wrong. In particular, I would like to note the governor granting preferential treatment to our attendant. Perhaps he needs her unconditional trust... to ensure that she does something or, on the contrary, remains uninvolved at just the right moment."

traits.locale_text: “一点都没错。我想特别指出这一点：那位总督相当照顾我们这位随行侍女。或许他想得到她无条件的信任……以便让她在某个特定的时刻做些什么，又或许恰恰相反，他希望她能在某个特定时刻置身事外。”

languages.text: "Durum gayet belli. Özellikle valinin eşlikçimize ayrıcalıklı davrandığını söylemek isterim. Belki de kendisinin koşulsuz güvenine muhtaçtır... Doğru an geldiğinde bir şeyler yapmasını ya da müdahale etmemesini sağlamak istiyordur."
languages.original_text: "You are not wrong. In particular, I would like to note the governor granting preferential treatment to our attendant. Perhaps he needs her unconditional trust... to ensure that she does something or, on the contrary, remains uninvolved at just the right moment."

traits.locale_text: "Durum gayet belli. Özellikle valinin eşlikçimize ayrıcalıklı davrandığını söylemek isterim. Belki de kendisinin koşulsuz güvenine muhtaçtır... Doğru an geldiğinde bir şeyler yapmasını ya da müdahale etmemesini sağlamak istiyordur."
